article_title: Tennessee lawmaker: Let ISIS recruit on college campuses [VIDEO]
article_text:
Conservatives are defending free speech on college campuses, but one Republican politician from Tennessee took it a little too far.

Fox News reported that a that state Rep. Daniel Martin proposed the “Tennessee Student Free Speech Protection Act” which would allow anyone to speak openly about their opinions — even if they’re a terrorist recruiting for ISIS.

“It’s just part of being exposed to different viewpoints,” said Martin.

Perhaps the state representative believes college kids are too smart to join ISIS. It’s safe to say some are, and others? Well, they vote for Bernie Sanders.

Watch the full clip below:

Conservatives are defending free speech on college campuses, but one Republican politician from Tennessee took it a little too far.
Perhaps the state representative believes college kids are too smart to join ISIS.
Fox News reported that a that state Rep. Daniel Martin proposed the “Tennessee Student Free Speech Protection Act” which would allow anyone to speak openly about their opinions — even if they’re a terrorist recruiting for ISIS.
“It’s just part of being exposed to different viewpoints,” said Martin.
Well, they vote for Bernie Sanders.
